fullForm: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bachelor of Science Nursing Entrance Exam
conductingBody: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi
eligibility: Candidates must have passed 10+2 with English, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology/Mathematics as compulsory subjects. Minimum marks required: 50-55% for General/EWS/OBC, 45-50% for SC/ST categories[2].
negativeMarking: 1/3 marks deducted for each incorrect answer[1][2].

faqs.question: What is the mode and marking scheme of the AIIMS BSc Nursing Entrance Exam?
faqs.answer: The AIIMS BSc Nursing Entrance Exam is conducted in online Computer-Based Test (CBT) mode. Each correct answer is awarded 1 mark, and 1/3 mark is deducted for every incorrect answer. The exam duration is 120 minutes and consists of 100 questions[1][2].
